value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.00276v1", "title": "Topological State Space Inference for Dynamical Systems", "summary": "We present a computational pipe aiming at recovery of the topology of the\nunderlying phase space from observation of an output function along a sample of\ntrajectories of a dynamical system.", "main_category": "math.DS", "categories": "math.DS,cs.SY,eess.SY,math.AT", "published": "2025-05-01T03:53:29Z"}
